data.author: Xiao Wei

changelog.release_notes:
Thanks to kumkee,I just update it to pebble 2.0.The original source code for pebble 1.0  is at:https://github.com/kumkee/pebble-chinese-geek.git
Eight-Character (八字, a.k.a. Four-Column 四柱) solar calendar (double-hour, date, month, and year)
Chinese quarter of hour (刻)
Yijing Hexagram (易经八卦图) as the binary representation of the 64ths of a quarter
Chinese traditional calendar date (农历)
Gregorgian year and date
Day of week

data.description:
Just update it to pebble 2.0
The original one is  from the author   kumkee  on CN-GEEK. 
Eight-Character (八字, a.k.a. Four-Column 四柱) solar calendar (double-hour, date, month, and year)
Chinese quarter of hour (刻)
Yijing Hexagram (易经八卦图) as the binary representation of the 64ths of a quarter
Chinese traditional calendar date (农历)
Gregorgian year and date
